page.title: 13SCOUT MOVEMENT: Bedfordshire
page.content:
Scouting is the largest single youth movement throughout the world.
In 1985 Scouting in Bedfordshire alone involved over 7000 people. Throughout the county there were 107 Scout groups catering for{Cub Scouts}in the age range 8 to 11 years old,{Scouts} between 11 and 15 and{Venture Scouts} for boys and girls up to age 20.
The annual census showed 3000 Cub Scouts, 1900 Scouts and over 300 Ventures.
The aim of the{Scout Association}is defined as being........
"To encourage the physical, mental and spiritual development of young people so that they may take a constructive place in society"
